message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $105.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $108.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $106.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still a bit above your target price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $107.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet my target price. I would like to counter with an offer of $106.50.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting close to your target price, but I still need to make a profit. I'll sell the product to you for $106.75.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $106.50.
Bob, I understand you're close to your target price, but I'm still not willing to go below $107. I'll meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $106.75.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $106.50.
